name: abomasite
effect: Held: Allows Abomasnow to Mega Evolve into Mega Abomasnow.
short_effect: Held: Allows Abomasnow to Mega Evolve into Mega Abomasnow.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Abomasnow hold it, and this stone will
enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
